metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12409 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: When using certain blank characters in a URL, they where incorrectly rendered as spaces instead of an encoded URL. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 77.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
